<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="12">
        <v-card>
          <v-card-title>
            Projects
            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            <v-btn color="primary" @click="createProject">Create Project</v-btn>
          </v-card-title>
          <v-card-text>
            <v-list>
              <v-list-item v-for="project in projects" :key="project.id">

                </v-list-item-content>
              </v-list-item>
            </v-list>

                >Create Teacher</v-btn
              >
            </v-form>
          </v-card-text>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>

    },

    },

    }

}
</script>
